title: EXIM Bank enters into $2.5 million Line of Credit agreement with Guyana
description: EXIM Bank of India signed a $2.5 million credit line with Guyana for a solar plant at Cheddi Jagan International Airport, effective June 24, 2024. 75% Indian goods, works, and services; 25% can be external. Signed February 29, 2024. Disbursement is within 48 months of project completion, the Reserve Bank of India noted.
